# note-editor - vue

> This repository contains code For UI in which functionality include related to 
 - add message/action/note
 - Edit message/action/note
 - drag/drop message
 - reset message

> Tech Stack used are:
  - Vue.js
  - Bootstrap

## Build Setup

# install stable version of node as per device requirement 
https://nodejs.org/en/download/

``` bash
# install dependencies
npm install

# serve with hot reload at localhost:8083
npm run dev

# build for production with minification
npm run build

# build for production and view the build run at localhost:5000
npm install -g serve
serve -s build/src -l 5000

For a detailed explanation on how things work, check out the [guide](http://vuejs-templates.github.io/webpack/) and [docs for vue-loader](http://vuejs.github.io/vue-loader).
